attributes.action: Allow householders to withhold an amount of council tax for not gritting or clearing their road during the recent cold snap. Only main roads or bus routes have been cleared. Many householders cannot leave their estate due to non supply of services already paid for (in good faith).
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Councils are keen to charge us for every item them allegly supply and often do not carry through with services.  We should be able to simply deduct for non supplied services.
